message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $130. It's a fair price considering the value this product brings.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $130 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to make a serious offer, and I think we can both benefit from a deal at this price.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I think $125 is the lowest I can go. It's still a great value for the product, and I think you'll appreciate it in the long run.
I'm getting close to your price, Alice, but I'm still not there. I'm willing to meet you at $115, but that's as low as I can go. I think we're close enough to make a deal work.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm willing to meet you at $117.50. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product brings, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase.

I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $115, just like I offered in round 6. I think this is a fair price, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product at this price.
